mapper.select: SELECT a.answer FROM (SELECT t.test_no , t.test_title , t.test_date , q.question_idx , q.question_title , e.example_idx , e.example_title , e.answer FROM test t INNER JOIN question q ON t.test_no = q.test_no INNER JOIN example e ON q.question_no = e.question_no WHERE t.test_no = #{testNo} ORDER BY q.question_idx ASC, example_idx ASC) a
